newsitem.title: LATVIA: LATVIA-CENTRAL BANK CUTS THREE, 6-MO REPO RATE.
newsitem.headline: LATVIA-CENTRAL BANK CUTS THREE, 6-MO REPO RATE.

text.p: The central bank on Friday set lower repurchase rates for maturities of three and six months and left one month and 12-month rates unchanged.

The one month rate for the July 18 repo auction was three percent, three months was 3.50 percent, down from four percent, the six month rate was four percent, down from five, and the 12-month was unchanged at six percent.
